page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT _ WALKERGATE
page.content: Mrs Stephenson has just become employed at the Shell{Garage.}She told us that she likes working there because she gets on well with the other{employees}and knows many of the customers.The garage sells more petrol than diesel fuel and sweets,ice_cream and various car accessories.The things she does not like are motorists' impatience when they have to queue and the prospect of being held up.If she is,she has two panic buttons to press which bring the police.She told us that many people pay in cash,but many also use Credit Cards of which 8 different types are accepted at the garage.
